spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is preserved, but door orientations and exact wall openings for entrances are inconsistent with the 2D plan. The entrance to the house is significantly altered.

structural_fidelity.notes: Internal door swings are missing or replaced with open gaps. The toilet/wash area layout has been simplified, and the stairs orientation is reversed/mirrored compared to the plan's 'UP' arrow logic.

furniture_mapping.notes: Excellent correspondence between plan furniture and 3D models. The dining chairs, kitchen appliances, and bedroom layout match the floor plan well.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High-quality isometric render with clean geometry, consistent lighting, and professional toy-house aesthetic.

detected_errors.description: Staircase directionality is reversed compared to the transition indicated on the floor plan.
The main entrance door is missing its specific recessed vestibule geometry shown in the 2D plan.
Actual door panels are missing, shown only as wall punctures.
Hallucinated additional sink/vanity in the wash area not clearly delineated in the simple 2D circle/square symbols.
